definition: A specialized area or field of knowledge, typically associated with a specific profession or academic discipline. It is commonly used to refer to a subject or subject area that requires expertise or specialized skills.

examples.german: Sie hat ein Fach für Mathematik.
examples.english: She has a specialization in mathematics.

examples.german: Das Buch ist in meinem Fach.
examples.english: The book is in my compartment.

examples.german: Er ist ein Fachmann auf seinem Gebiet.
examples.english: He is an expert in his field.
